page.description: The .INSERT() method inserts text at the current cursor position in an RTF Memo field.

argument.name: Text_to_Insert
argument.description: The text to insert at the current cursor position

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example inserts text into an RTF field on an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.set_cursor(1) obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text")
